title: The conversation suggests that Wang Jun is

content.question: The conversation suggests that Wang Jun is

choices.label: enthusiastic about recruiting a better player to participate in the upcoming Go tournament
proud to coach the school team for the upcoming Go tournament
against the idea of joining the school team for the upcoming Go tournament
uncertain about joining the school team for the upcoming Go tournament

content.answer: uncertain about joining the school team for the upcoming Go tournament

skill.text: Skill 3.B: Interpret the meaning of a text.
